```{r}
with(mtcars,
     {
         summary(mpg)
         plot(mpg, disp)
         abline(lm(disp ~ mpg))
         plot(mpg, wt)
         abline(lm(wt ~ mpg))
     })

with(mtcars,{
    nokeep <- summary(mpg)
    keep <<- summary(mpg)
})
keep
```


```{r}
library(tibble)
as_tibble(mtcars)
```

- `tibble` never change the names of variable.  
- `tibble` never convert character variables to factors.  
- subsetting a `tibble` always returns a `tibble`.  
- `tibble` don't support row names.
